channel.title: Librarian Code on Robot Librarian
channel.description: Recent content in Librarian Code on Robot Librarian

item.title: Ruby gem library_stdnums goes to version 1.0
item.description: I just released another (this time pretty good) version of my gem for normalizing/validating library standard numbers, library_stdnums (github source / docs). The short version of the functions available: ISBN: get checkdigit, validate, convert isbn10 to/from isbn13, normalize (to 13-digit) ISSN: get checkdigit, validate, normalize LCCN: validate, normalize Validation of LCCNs doesn’t involve a checkdigit; I basically just normalize whatever is sent in and then see if the result is syntactically valid.
